oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Functionalized phosphines : synthesis, reactivity and transition metal chemistry
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: BALAKRISHNA, MS
PRIYA, S
PANDA, R
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: ruthenium(ii)
complexes
aminophosphines
funcationalized phosphines
hemilabile
inorganic heterocycles
metallacycles
phosphine ethers
transition metals
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Ten-membered heterocycles of the type PhN(PCl2){OC6H2(R)(2) (mu-S(CH2))((R)(2)-C6H2O-)} (R = Me, Pr-i or Bu-t) have been prepared and their transition metal chemistry is explored. Functionalised phosphines react with transition metals to give interesting metallacycles. Several Group 6, ruthenium, platinum metals and novel titanium(TV) metallacycles have been structurally characterized.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: PHOSPHORUS SULFUR AND SILICON AND THE RELATED ELEMENTS,179,911-914
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: 10th International Symposium on Inorganic Ring Systems (IRIS 10),Burlington, VT,AUG 17-22, 2003
